name: TVcountdown.com - Highlight Favorites (Updated)
description:
A demonstration of how css can help make finding things faster using text decorations

Update:
Tvcountdown.com updated their webpages and now the [title] attribute is no longer present and the previous userstyle won't work.
But we can select the show using the [href] show number indirectly.

eg.

Dexter="?c19=1"
House="?c2=1" etc.
